attributes.action: Provide a tax break on low milage commuters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our roads are more congested than ever and the figures show that the number of drivers on our roads is set to increase furthermore in the coming years.

It is guaranteed that there is someone doing the same role as you, for the same amount of money commuting to the area you live in - just as you commute to theirs.

I believe a sensible move to ease congestion, cut the amount of wear and tear on the roads, sustain community relations and help reduce emissions would be to offer a tax incentive to those who work within 'x' miles of their homes.
